verses.kjv: Bow down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.
verses.ct: Listen closely to me, LORD, and respond, because I am weak and in need.

verses.kjv: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.
verses.ct: Guard my soul, for I am devoted to you. You are my God — rescue your servant who puts his trust in you.

verses.kjv: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.
verses.ct: Show me mercy, Lord, because I call out to you all day long.

verses.kjv: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
verses.ct: Bring joy to your servant's soul, because I offer my soul up to you, Lord.

verses.kjv: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
verses.ct: You, Lord, are good and willing to forgive, overflowing with mercy toward everyone who calls on you.

verses.kjv: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.
verses.ct: Pay attention to my prayer, LORD, and listen to my desperate pleas.

verses.kjv: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.
verses.ct: When trouble comes, I will call on you, because you will answer me.

verses.kjv: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.
verses.ct: No other god compares to you, Lord, and nothing matches what you have done.

verses.kjv: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.
verses.ct: Every nation you have made will come and bow down in your presence, Lord, and bring honor to your name.

verses.kjv: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.
verses.ct: You are great and perform amazing things — you alone are God.

verses.kjv: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.
verses.ct: Show me your path, LORD, and I will follow your truth. Focus my heart on being wholeheartedly dedicated to your name.

verses.kjv: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.
verses.ct: I will praise you, Lord my God, with everything in me, and I will honor your name forever.

verses.kjv: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.
verses.ct: Your mercy toward me is enormous — you have rescued my soul from the depths of death.

verses.kjv: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.
verses.ct: God, arrogant people have risen up against me, and a mob of violent people wants to take my life. They give you no thought at all.

verses.kjv: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, long suffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
verses.ct: But you, Lord, are a God filled with compassion and grace, slow to anger, and overflowing with mercy and truth.

verses.kjv: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.
verses.ct: Turn toward me and show me mercy. Give your strength to your servant, and save the child of your faithful servant.

verses.kjv: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, LORD, hast holpen me, and comforted me.
verses.ct: Give me a sign of your goodness so that those who hate me will see it and be put to shame, because you, LORD, have helped me and brought me comfort.
